27 struct EulerAngles
28 {
29  double roll, pitch, yaw;
30 };
31 
32 const double PI = 3.14159265359;
33 
38 EulerAngles ToEulerAngles(Quaternion q)
39 {
40  EulerAngles angles;
41 
42  // roll (x-axis rotation)
43  double sinr_cosp = 2 * (q.w * q.x + q.y * q.z);
44  double cosr_cosp = 1 - 2 * (q.x * q.x + q.y * q.y);
45  angles.roll = std::atan2(sinr_cosp, cosr_cosp);
46 
47  // pitch (y-axis rotation)
48  double sinp = 2 * (q.w * q.y - q.z * q.x);
49  if (std::abs(sinp) >= 1)
50  angles.pitch = std::copysign(M_PI / 2, sinp); // use 90 degrees if out of range
51  else
52  angles.pitch = std::asin(sinp);
53 
54  // yaw (z-axis rotation)
55  double siny_cosp = 2 * (q.w * q.z + q.x * q.y);
56  double cosy_cosp = 1 - 2 * (q.y * q.y + q.z * q.z);
57  angles.yaw = std::atan2(siny_cosp, cosy_cosp);
58 
59  return angles;
60 }
61 
66 Quaternion ToQuaternion(double yaw, double pitch, double roll) // yaw (Z), pitch (Y), roll (X)
67 {
68  double cy = cos(yaw * 0.5);
69  double sy = sin(yaw * 0.5);
70  double cp = cos(pitch * 0.5);
71  double sp = sin(pitch * 0.5);
72  double cr = cos(roll * 0.5);
73  double sr = sin(roll * 0.5);
74 
75  Quaternion q;
76  q.w = cr * cp * cy + sr * sp * sy;
77  q.x = sr * cp * cy - cr * sp * sy;
78  q.y = cr * sp * cy + sr * cp * sy;
79  q.z = cr * cp * sy - sr * sp * cy;
80 
81  return q;
82 }
83 
88 void angleTo360(double &angle)
89 {
90  if(angle < 0)
91  angle = -angle;
92  else
93  angle = 360 - angle;
94 }
95 
100 float mapValue(float x, float in_min, float in_max, float out_min, float out_max)
101 {
102  return (x - in_min) * (out_max - out_min) / (in_max - in_min) + out_min;
103 }
